field.text.caption: Physician/Provider ID
field.text.hint: To use the ID autosuggestion feature, leave this field blank
field.text.name: person_id

field.select.caption: Person Type
field.select.name: physician_type
field.select.choices: Physician;Physician Extender (direct billing);Other Clinical Service Provider (direct billing);Other Clinical Services Provider (alternate billing)

field.text.caption: Doctor to bill for this provider
field.text.name: bill_provider

field.composite.caption: Relationship To Responsible Party/Other Relationship Name
field.composite.hint: Select an existing relationship type or select 'Other' and fill in the 'Other' field
field.composite.name: relation
